original_text: And to whom did he swear that they would not enter his rest, but to those who were disobedient?
korean_text: 또 하나님이 누구에게 맹세하사 그의 안식에 들어오지 못하리라 하셨느냐 곧 순종하지 아니하던 자들에게가 아니냐

sentences.original_text: And to whom did he swear
that they would not enter his rest
but to those who were disobedient?
